title: Quanzhi Fashi II
synopsis: After defeating Yu Ang at the cost of revealing his lightning element, Mo Fan has been granted seven days to train in the Underground Holy Spring, where it is said that one can greatly increase their power level.
characters: ['Mo, Fan', 'Zhang, Xiaohou', 'Yue, Tang', 'Mu, Ningxue', 'Ye, Xinxia', 'Mu, Shengxue']
